name: Chiroform Infrared Foot Massager
descr:
Chiroform Infrared Blood Circulation Massager with remote controller.
 
1. High frequency massage can improve blood circulation and metabolism
2. Infrared hot wave: better to relieve tension
3. Long magnetic wave and 8 natural magnets
4. Four automatic models ,8 nature magnets
5. Massage and infrared level adjustment
6. 5 to15 minutes micro-auto program vibration massage
7. For the feet,waist,legs,back,buttocks and plam
8. Light and handy design
 
And much more.
